```{r}
library(tidyverse)
clinical <- read_csv("~/R/DS-3001/data/clinical_breast_cleaned.csv")
```

```{r}
x1 <- group_by(clinical, Tumor)
x2 <- summarize(x1, mean(Age.at.Initial.Pathologic.Diagnosis))
df <- as.data.frame(x2)
bargraph <- ggplot(df, aes(x=Tumor, y=`mean(Age.at.Initial.Pathologic.Diagnosis)`)) + geom_bar(stat='identity', fill = "#2cc4ff") +ggtitle("Tumor Stage vs. Average Age of Diagnosis")

bargraph
```
